questions.question: select distinct ("{class_1}" as ?c1) ?r1 ("{class_2}" as ?c2) ?r2 ("{class_1}" as ?c3) { ?v1 a {class_1} . ?v2 a {class_2} . { ?v1 ?r1 ?v2 } union { ?v2 ?r2 ?v1 } }

prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> prefix mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> prefix time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#> prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> select distinct ?artist ?artist_name ?record ?record_name { ?artist a mo:MusicArtist . ?record a mo:Record . ?artist foaf:made ?record . ?artist foaf:name ?artist_name . ?record dc:title ?record_name } order by ?artist limit 20
